duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute strategies to boost revenue through product assortment, pricing optimization, and upselling/cross-selling techniques across online stores.
Continuously analyze user behavior and website data to identify conversion bottlenecks and drop-off points.
Devise and manage targeted marketing campaigns to drive sales, leveraging various channels such as email marketing, social media, and paid advertising.
Implement customer retention strategies, including loyalty programs, personalized recommendations, and post-purchase engagement.
Regularly monitor sales performance, analyzing key metrics like customer acquisition cost, customer lifetime value, and return on ad spend.
Utilize advanced knowledge of the Shopify platform to optimize the online store for revenue growth.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, Ecommerce, or related field (or equivalent work experience)
